logo.text.label: Logo Text
logo.text.description: The logo text will be used, if no logo image has been picked. If an image has been picked, it will be used as an aria-label attribute on the link.

logo.image_svg_inline.description: Select your logo. Optionally inject an SVG logo into the markup so it adopts the text color automatically.

logo._image_dimension.description: Setting just one value preserves the original proportions. The image will be resized and cropped automatically, and where possible, high resolution images will be auto-generated.

logo.image_inverse.label: Inverse Logo (Optional)
logo.image_inverse.description: Select an alternative logo with inversed color, e.g. white, for better visibility on dark backgrounds. It will be displayed automatically, if needed.

logo.image_mobile.label: Mobile Logo (Optional)
logo.image_mobile.description: Select an alternative logo, which will be used on small devices.

logo._image_mobile_dimension.description: Setting just one value preserves the original proportions. The image will be resized and cropped automatically, and where possible, high resolution images will be auto-generated.

logo.image_mobile_inverse.label: Mobile Inverse Logo (Optional)
logo.image_mobile_inverse.description: Select an alternative logo with inversed color, e.g. white, for better visibility on dark backgrounds. It will be displayed automatically, if needed.

logo.image_dialog.label: Dialog Logo (Optional)
logo.image_dialog.description: Select a logo, which will be shown in offcanvas and modal dialogs of certain header layouts.

logo._image_dialog_dimension.description: Setting just one value preserves the original proportions. The image will be resized and cropped automatically, and where possible, high resolution images will be auto-generated.

site.boxed.media.label: Image
site.boxed.media.description: Upload an optional background image that covers the page. It will be fixed while scrolling.

site.breadcrumbs_show_home.description: Show or hide the home link as first item as well as the current page as last item in the breadcrumb navigation.

site.breadcrumbs_home_text.label: Breadcrumbs Home Text
site.breadcrumbs_home_text.description: Enter the text for the home link.

site.main_section.height.label: Main Section Height
site.main_section.height.description: On short pages, the main section can be expanded to fill the viewport. This only applies to pages which are not build with the page builder.

site._image_dimension.description: Set the width and height in pixels (e.g. 600). Setting just one value preserves the original proportions. The image will be resized and cropped automatically.

site.image_focal_point.label: Focal Point
site.image_focal_point.description: Set a focal point to adjust the image focus when cropping.

site.image_size.label: Image Size
site.image_size.description: Determine whether the image will fit the page dimensions by clipping it or by filling the empty areas with the background color.

site.image_position.label: Image Position
site.image_position.description: Set the initial background position, relative to the page layer.

site.image_effect.label: Image Effect
site.image_effect.description: Add a parallax effect or fix the background with regard to the viewport while scrolling.

site.image_parallax_easing.label: Parallax Easing
site.image_parallax_easing.description: Set the animation easing. Zero transitions at an even speed, a negative value starts off quickly while a positive value starts off slowly.

site.image_parallax_breakpoint.label: Parallax Breakpoint
site.image_parallax_breakpoint.description: Display the parallax effect only on this device width and larger.

site.image_visibility.label: Visibility
site.image_visibility.description: Display the image only on this device width and larger.

site.media_background.label: Background Color
site.media_background.description: Use the background color in combination with blend modes, a transparent image or to fill the area if the image doesn't cover the whole page.

site.media_blend_mode.label: Blend Mode
site.media_blend_mode.description: Determine how the image will blend with the background color.

site.media_overlay.label: Overlay Color
site.media_overlay.description: Set an additional transparent overlay to soften the image.

header.layout.label: Layout
header.layout.description: Select the layout for the logo, navbar and header positions. Some layouts can split or push items of a position which are shown as ellipsis.
header.layout.title: Select header layout

header.split_index.label: Split Items
header.split_index.description: The logo is placed automatically between the items. Optionally, set the number of items after which the items are split.

header.push_index.label: Push Items
header.push_index.description: Set the number of items after which the following items are pushed to the right.

navbar.sticky.label: Navbar
navbar.sticky.description: Stick the navbar at the top of the viewport while scrolling or only when scrolling up.

header.transparent_color_separately.description: Make the header transparent even when it's sticky.

navbar.dropdown_click.description: Align dropdowns to their menu item or the navbar. Optionally, show them in a full-width section called dropbar, display an icon to indicate dropdowns and let text items open by click and not hover.
navbar.dropdown_click.text: Enable click mode on text items

dialog.layout.label: Dialog Layout
dialog.layout.description: Select the layout for the dialog position. Items which can be pushed are shown as ellipsis.
dialog.layout.title: Select dialog layout

dialog.push_index.label: Dialog Push Items
dialog.push_index.description: Set the number of items after which the following items are pushed to the bottom.

dialog.toggle_text.text: Show the menu text next to the icon

dialog.dropbar.animation.label: Dropbar Animation
dialog.dropbar.animation.description: Select the animation on how the dropbar appears below the navbar.

dialog.dropbar.width.label: Dropbar Width
dialog.dropbar.width.description: Set the dropbar width if it slides in from the left or right.

dialog.dropbar.content_width.label: Dropbar Content Width
dialog.dropbar.content_width.description: Set the width of the dropbar content.

header.search.label: Search
header.search.description: Select the position that will display the search.

header.social_image_svg_inline.description: Select the position that will display the social icons.

header.social_gap.label: Social Icons Gap
header.social_gap.description: Set the size of the gap between the social icons.

link.label: Link
link.description: Enter link to your social profile. A corresponding UIkit brand icon will be displayed automatically, if available. Links to email addresses and phone numbers, like mailto:info@example.com or tel:+491570156, are also supported.

link_aria_label.label: Link ARIA Label
link_aria_label.description: Set a different link ARIA label for this item.

icon.label: Icon
icon.description: Pick an alternative icon from the icon library.

image.label: Image
image.description: Pick an alternative SVG image from the media manager.

mobile.breakpoint.label: Visibility
mobile.breakpoint.description: Select the device size where the default header will be replaced by the mobile header.

mobile.header.layout.label: Layout
mobile.header.layout.description: Select the layout for the logo-mobile, navbar-mobile and header-mobile positions.
mobile.header.layout.title: Select mobile header layout

mobile.navbar.sticky.label: Navbar
mobile.navbar.sticky.description: Stick the navbar at the top of the viewport while scrolling or only when scrolling up.

mobile.header.transparent_color_separate.description: Make the header transparent even when it's sticky.

mobile.dialog.layout.label: Dialog Layout
mobile.dialog.layout.description: Select the layout for the dialog-mobile position. Pushed items of the position are shown as ellipsis.
mobile.dialog.layout.title: Select mobile dialog layout

mobile.dialog.push_index.label: Dialog Push Items
mobile.dialog.push_index.description: Set the number of items after which the following items are pushed to the bottom.

mobile.dialog.toggle_text.text: Show the menu text next to the icon

mobile.dialog.dropbar.animation.label: Dropbar Animation
mobile.dialog.dropbar.animation.description: Select the animation on how the dropbar appears below the navbar.

mobile.header.search.label: Search
mobile.header.search.description: Select the position that will display the search.

mobile.social_image_svg_inline.description: Select the position that will display the social icons. Be sure to add your social profile links or no icons can be displayed.

mobile.header.social_gap.label: Social Icons Gap
mobile.header.social_gap.description: Set the size of the gap between the social icons.

link.label: Link
link.description: Enter link to your social profile. A corresponding UIkit brand icon will be displayed automatically, if available. Links to email addresses and phone numbers, like mailto:info@example.com or tel:+491570156, are also supported.

link_aria_label.label: Link ARIA Label
link_aria_label.description: Set a different link ARIA label for this item.

icon.label: Icon
icon.description: Pick an alternative icon from the icon library.

image.label: Image
image.description: Pick an alternative SVG image from the media manager.

icon.label: Icon
icon.description: Instead of using a custom image, you can click on the pencil to pick an icon from the icon library.

image_only.label: Image and Title
image_only.description: Only show the image or icon.

subtitle.label: Subtitle
subtitle.description: Enter a subtitle that will be displayed beneath the nav item.

dropdown.stretch.label: Dropdown Stretch
dropdown.stretch.description: Stretch the dropdown to the width of the navbar or the navbar container.

dropdown.width.label: Dropdown Width
dropdown.width.description: Set the dropdown width in pixels (e.g. 600).

divider.label: Divider
divider.description: Show optional dividers between nav or subnav items.

_image_dimensions.description: Setting just one value preserves the original proportions. The image will be resized and cropped automatically, and where possible, high resolution images will be auto-generated.

image_svg_inline.label: Inline SVG
image_svg_inline.description: Inject SVG images into the markup so they adopt the text color automatically.

top.overlap.description: Preserve the text color, for example when using cards. Section overlap is not supported by all styles and may have no visual effect.

top.video.label: Video
top.video.description: Select a video file or enter a link from YouTube or Vimeo.

top.text_color.label: Text Color
top.text_color.description: Force a light or dark color for text, buttons and controls on the image or video background.

top.height_offset_top.description: Set a fixed height, and optionally subtract the header height to fill the first visible viewport. Alternatively, expand the height so the next section also fits the viewport, or on smaller pages to fill the viewport.

top.vertical_align.label: Vertical Alignment
top.vertical_align.description: Align the section content vertically, if the section height is larger than the content itself.

top.header_transparent_noplaceholder.description: Make the header transparent and overlay this section if it directly follows the header.

top.header_transparent_text_color.label: Header Text Color
top.header_transparent_text_color.description: Force a light or dark color for text, buttons and controls on the image or video background.

top.column_gap.label: Column Gap
top.column_gap.description: Set the size of the gap between the grid columns.

top.row_gap.label: Row Gap
top.row_gap.description: Set the size of the gap between the grid rows.

top.divider.label: Divider
top.divider.description: Show a divider between grid columns.

top.match.label: Panels
top.match.description: Stretch the panel to match the height of the grid cell.

top.breakpoint.label: Breakpoint
top.breakpoint.description: Set the breakpoint from which grid items will stack.

top._image_dimension.description: Set the width and height in pixels (e.g. 600). Setting just one value preserves the original proportions. The image will be resized and cropped automatically.

top.media_focal_point.label: Focal Point
top.media_focal_point.description: Set a focal point to adjust the image focus when cropping.

top.image_loading.label: Loading
top.image_loading.description: By default, images are loaded lazy. Enable eager loading for images in the initial viewport.

top.image_size.label: Image Size
top.image_size.description: Determine whether the image will fit the section dimensions by clipping it or by filling the empty areas with the background color.

top.image_position.label: Image Position
top.image_position.description: Set the initial background position, relative to the section layer.

top.image_fixed.label: Image Attachment
top.image_fixed.text: Fix the background with regard to the viewport.

top.media_visibility.label: Visibility
top.media_visibility.description: Display the image only on this device width and larger.

top.media_background.label: Background Color
top.media_background.description: Use the background color in combination with blend modes, a transparent image or to fill the area, if the image doesn't cover the whole section.

top.media_blend_mode.label: Blend Mode
top.media_blend_mode.description: Determine how the image or video will blend with the background color.

top.media_overlay.label: Overlay Color
top.media_overlay.description: Set an additional transparent overlay to soften the image or video.

main_sidebar.width.label: Width
main_sidebar.width.description: Set a sidebar width in percent and the content column will adjust accordingly. The width will not go below the Sidebar's min-width, which you can set in the Style section.

main_sidebar.breakpoint.label: Breakpoint
main_sidebar.breakpoint.description: Set the breakpoint from which the sidebar and content will stack.

main_sidebar.first.label: Order
main_sidebar.first.text: Move the sidebar to the left of the content

main_sidebar.gutter.label: Gap
main_sidebar.gutter.description: Set the padding between sidebar and content.

main_sidebar.divider.label: Divider
main_sidebar.divider.text: Display a divider between sidebar and content
